scripts.clone: if [ ! -d '/var/www/focus-pocus.ro' ]; then sudo git clone https://github.com/CHINuit/focus-pocus.ro /var/www/focus-pocus.ro; fi
scripts.sync: cd /var/www/focus-pocus.ro &&sudo git stash save --keep-index && sudo git pull --force origin master
scripts.build: cd /var/www/focus-pocus.ro && sudo chmod -R 755 /var/www/focus-pocus.ro/node_modules && sudo npm install &&sudo npm audit fix && sudo npm build
